1.0.name: wordpress/custom-post-archives
1.0.description:
Custom Post Archives bridges the gap between creating Custom Post Types in WordPress 3, and actually displaying those posts. With this plugin, you have the option of displaying a completely seperate blog-like section for each post type, complete with all the features you expect to see with WordPress.

For each custom post type, if you click "active" and enter a slug-name, this plugin will let you display post-type specific:

  • Archives
  • Date archives
  • Author archives
  • Category archives
  • RSS Feeds

This plug-in also provides many additional features to fully integrate your custom post types, including:

  • Adds a menu option to the new menu section created in WordPress 3 (for themes that support it)
  • Combined archives (http://www.mysite.com/type1+type2/)
  • Option to add post types to default blog
  • Option to add post types to
